remarks: Moore closure is idempotent.  Deduction form of ~ mrcidm .  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
mrcssidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( Moore ` X ) ) $.
mrcssidd.2 $e |- N = ( mrCls ` A ) $.
mrcssidd.3 $e |- ( ph -> U C_ X ) $.
mrcidmd $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( N ` U ) ) = ( N ` U ) ) $.
